heroSubtitle: Buy, sell and find help in your neighborhood
heroDescription: Need someone to walk your dog, help you move, or fix something at home? Connect with trusted locals who can help.
heroDescriptionLong: Need someone to walk your dog, help you move, or fix something at home? Connect with trusted locals who can help — usually within hours.
signInWithPhone: Sign in with your phone number
agreeTerms: By continuing, you agree to our
searchingOpportunities: Searching for opportunities within 25km radius of Riga, Latvia
howItWorksDesc: Whether you need help or want to earn money — it's simple
postTaskDesc: Describe what you need help with and set your budget
getOffersDesc: Local helpers will apply — review their profiles and ratings
getItDoneDesc: Pick your helper, they complete the task, you pay them directly
browseMapDesc: See tasks posted near you in real-time on the map
applyToTasksDesc: Found something you can help with? Send your offer
earnMoneyDesc: Complete tasks, build your reputation, and get paid
popularTasksDesc: People in your area are getting help with...
builtOnTrustDesc: Your safety and security come first
phoneVerifiedDesc: Every user verifies their phone number — no anonymous accounts
ratingsAndReviewsDesc: See real feedback from other users before you decide
inAppChatDesc: Communicate directly and securely within the app
readyToStartDesc: Join your local community and start getting things done today.
